class.name: MetaPlatformSDK_AssetDetails
class.brief_description: Represents details about an asset file.
class.description: Represents details about an asset file.

members.member: One of 'default', 'store', or 'language_pack'. The 'default' type denotes this Asset File is used purely as an implementation detail (to download extra content post-installation). The 'store' type indicates that the Asset File should be shown in Store. The 'language_pack' is a special type used to manage different languages and translation data, which can be downloaded post-installation.
File path of the asset file.
For 'language_pack' assets type, contains language info. This may be [code]null[/code], which indicates that the value is not present or that the curent app or user is not permitted to access it.
Extra metadata associated with this asset file.
